text: @nidhiindiatv Bring all FMGEs to fight COVID-19 which is going to be a long battle. You need Young Doctors to be kept in reserve to fight with COVID-19 Dn't delay Bring an Ordinance Remove the Barrier(FMGE)Aftr all FMG's are from WHO recognized @NITIAayog @PMOIndia  @narendramodi
